title: 'I'm Amazed at How Good Our Officials Are'
description: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell floated artificial intelligence as a potential tool to help referees with officiating on the field.
content:
“I’m amazed at how good our officials are,” he said, adding that artificial intelligence could be a tool. However, he admitted that certain protections would be needed to prevent “the obvious error” of the technology.

title: Elon Musk's xAI bought by Elon Musk's SpaceX
description: Elon Musk is joining his space exploration and artificial intelligence ventures into a single company before a massive planned initial public offering for the business later this year.
content:
His rocket venture, SpaceX, announced on Monday that it had bought xAI in an effort to help the world's richest man dominate the rocket and artificial intelligence businesses.

title: Crypto’s AI push stalls without a ‘ChatGPT moment,’ Justin Sun says
description: After posting “All in AI” on X, the Tron founder says artificial intelligence could become crypto’s next major growth driver as the industry works toward clearer product-market fit.
content:
